export var authEndpoint="https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize";var redirectUri="https://new-spotify-clone.web.app"/*"http://localhost:3000/"*/;var clientId="c8b5d20bd8bf4e64b2e4bb2c52194a08";var scopes=["user-read-currently-playing","user-read-recently-played","user-read-playback-state","user-top-read","user-modify-playback-state"];export var getTokenFromUrl=function getTokenFromUrl(){return window.location.hash.substring(1).split("&").reduce(function(initial,item){// #accessToken=mysupersecretkey&name=sonny
var parts=item.split('=');initial[parts[0]]=decodeURIComponent(parts[1]);return initial;},{});};export var loginUrl="".concat(authEndpoint,"?client_id=").concat(clientId,"&redirect_uri=").concat(redirectUri,"&scope=").concat(scopes.join("%20"),"&response_type=token&show_dialog=true");
